description.value:
The Sallow Maiden oversees nightmares and the monstrous. An ancient enemy of Vorunar, the Fury of dark beasts is the mother of monsters.

Edicts: Bring power to outcasts and the downtrodden, make the beautiful monstrous, reveal the corruption and flaws in all things.

Anathema: Root out a population of monsters, spread hope.

Areas of Concern: Monsters, night terrors.
